forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 50. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the city lays hushed in the early hours, a blanket of clouds lingers above, whispering the promise of a cooler breeze. While the overnight temperature hovers around the inviting low fifties, the air carries a comforting chill that speaks to the heart of San Francisco weather. Come Sunday, the forecast hints at a gradual unveiling of sunshine, with the warmth peeking near sixty-three degrees, a soft embrace that will slip into the crisp air of the afternoon. 

Yet, the familiar marine layer dances at the edges, teasing visibility while reminding us of the bay's ever-present influence. It can be quite enchanting, this interplay of sun and fog, offering moments where the iconic silhouettes of the Golden Gate Bridge emerge dramatically from the mist. Dress in layers to navigate this poetic contrast; a light sweater or jacket might serve you well, as the winds meander gently from the southwest, mirroring the day's moods. Taking a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or sipping coffee at an outdoor café could be wonderful ways to savor the unfolding day. Embrace the delightful complexity of San Francisco, where every moment feels like a gentle conversation with the weather itself.
